author: Alexander Bolton
title: Senate Democrats unveil $500 billion short-term coronavirus relief plan
description: Senate Democrats on Thursday unveiled the details of a $500 billion coronavirus relief plan they will offer later in the morning when Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-Ky.) requests unanimous consent to provide an...
